name: Nightly Docks
description:
This interactive scene is directly inspired by Genshin Impact and I drew inspiration from existing assets, places and game art styles within the game as well as using a strict colour palette. 

I had a lot of fun with this one as I got to tackle a lot of uv unwrapping and shaders so I'm pretty proud of the result of this! Definitely going to help improve my future games with what I know now :)

Asset Credits and Tutorials used in Read Me. Created for RMIT Games 3D Art Studio 2022 Final Assignment. Using assets from a shared student library, details in read me :) If you have any questions about some of the assets where names are withdrawn please contact me and I'll share where/who I got the assets from.
